resources.string:
One finger tap: Left-click
Two finger tap: Right-click
Two finger drag: Scroll
Long press: Drag

Thanks for installing the Simple Computer Remote!

In order to operate this remote, you need to have the host application installed on the computer you wish to operate.
Go to http://rekaplogic.com on your computer and download the appropriate host software for your operating system to get your computer set up for use.

For upgrading users, please update the server software to ensure you have all of the latest features.

New features requiring server upgrade:
Two finger scrolling.

New features for this release:
Long press to drag
Two finger scrolling
Two finger tap for right click
